channel.title: Whonix VirtualBox 14.0.1.3.8 - Point Release - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Testers Wanted!
This is a release candidate for a [point release](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release).
Debian APT remote code execution vulnerability [DSA 4371-1](https://lists.debian.org/debian-security-announce/2019/msg00010.html) is fixed in this version. Therefore, [special instructions for upgrading](https://forums.whonix.org/t/special-instructions-required-to-securely-update-because-of-apt-security-update-dsa-4371-1/6721) are **not** required. The usual [standard ("everyday") upgrading instructions](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates) should be applied.
-----
Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Testers_Only_Version
